A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: So sick and tired of all this SJW bullcrap\, It's WAY to obvious and horrible. And for what purpose? This is the worst Star wars Movie so far\, and I used to agree with the masses that 1-3 (the prequels) were utter s...t\, But at least they were only awful\, and not extremely filled with political bs/sjw mentality and other ridiculous plots and all. Gawd\, this is the only movie in my entire life where I didn't mind that it was ending soon\, or where I actually hoped for it to end sooner then it did. But because I love Star wars from childhood\, I just simply had to watch until the end... \n\nLeft the cinema with a very disappointed feel.
